API_Description: A property that determines whether the Escape key can be used to exit full-screen mode.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'fsEscape' suggests it relates to the Escape key functionality in full-screen mode, which is a common feature in applications to allow users to exit full-screen mode.
Returns: A boolean value indicating if the Escape key can be used to exit full-screen mode.
Returns_Reason: The parameter type is boolean, which implies the property returns a boolean value that likely enables or disables the Escape key functionality.

type.description: A boolean value to set whether the Escape key can be used to exit full-screen mode.
type.description_reason: The parameter is of type boolean, suggesting it is used to enable or disable a feature, in this case, the use of the Escape key in full-screen mode.
type.type_reason: The parameter is explicitly defined as a boolean, indicating it is used to toggle a feature on or off.
